events.name: After I/O Extended

venue.name: Cultural and Conference Center of Heraklion

events.description:
Join us for a two days tech event where we will discover all the latest updates for our beloved platforms.

Especially we will focus on Android, Cloud, Machine Learning, Augmented Reality and IoT

We will have also some local developers showcasing their projects, their experiences and their achievements.

The agenda on the official G After I/O site will be finalized and updated constantly. So please for latest updates and info, refer to the site.

events.name: Learn how to pitch your idea + a few news from GDG | GDD extended
events.description:
Join us and learn all the news and updates that GDG is preparing for you, from the collaboration with Startup Weekend Heraklion to a little report of what happened at the Google flagship event Google Developers Days, happened just last month, with insights and latest announcements from Google.

We will also have a session dedicated to how to pitch your idea, a speeded-up talk on the process fundamentals, of course open to discussions. If you want you can also share with us your experiences (ping us).

We will have plenty of time to talk and to know all the plans of GDG Heraklion and GDG Greece!

Looking forward in seeing you all on October the 11!

For better handling registrations (not due, but recommended) we gently ask you if you can register <a>here on Eventbrite</a>, as well

events.name: GDG Devfest 2017 Greece
events.description:
IT IS IMPORTANT THAT YOU RESERVE YOUR SEAT AT THIS LINK: http://bit.ly/devfestGR17

events.name: Google Study Jams | Mobile Sites
events.description:
• Purpose
A professional accreditation that Google offers.
Aimed at demonstrating an understanding in basic and advanced aspects of mobile website design and development.
You need basic web development skills to take part.

• What to bring
Notebook, Pen, Charged Laptop/Tablet

• Agenda
Welcome & Introduction | 15:45

Chapter 01 | 16:00
• Mobile Sites and why they matter
• Improving mobile site speed

Break | 17:30

Chapter 02 | 17:45
• Creating an effective mobile UX
• Advanced Web technologies

Break | 19:15

Online Exam | 19:30

End of Examination | 21:00

events.name: Google Assistant | Actions on Google | The intro
events.description:
Actions on Google and Google Assistant are one of the major Google technical areas and we want to invite the whole developer community to learn about creating Actions for the Google Assistant.
“Build Actions for Your Community” is an open and modular event series designed by Google.
This is the kick off of a series of events focused on:
1. The Intro (what we will be doing today)
2. The Codelabs & Hacking (supported by Google-authored content)
3. The Technical Feedback to Google (driven by a Google feedback form)
4. The Actions showcasing on event and on Google site
5. The Webinars for developers and interested parties

F.A.Q.
A. Do I need to bring my laptop?
Not for today, we will have an intro on Google Assistant and Actions on Google and we will engage with participants to sign up for the following meetups

B. Do I have to be a developer for participating?
Not essentially at this meetup, for the following meetup we will inform you about pre-requisites. In case you can always create a team and have a developer in it

C. I have a company/school/organization and I would like to build something on Google Assistant, can I participate?
Yes we invite the wider communities/companies/organizations to participate, form a team and build awesome apps

events.name: TensorFlow DevSummit 18 | ViewParty
events.description:
TensorFlow Dev Summit brings together a diverse mix of machine learning users from around the world for a full day of highly technical talks, demos, and conversation with the TensorFlow team and community in Mountain View (CA).

We will watch the Keynote opening session directly from The Computer History Museum in Mountain View. After the viewparty we will have a little intro on the Study Jam on Machine Learning and we will collect interest from participants in order to evaluate the possibility to organize a Crash Course in the city of Heraklion.

F.A.Q.
1. Do I need to bring my laptop?
Nope at this meetup you do not need a laptop, as it is a more get to know the course and each other and start planning for the actual Study Jam
2. Will we do any demos?
We are thinking of showing some features of TensorFlow and how awesome it is ;-)

events.name: Coffee Session by GDG Heraklion
events.description:
Who’s available to talk about Google’s new technologies and help us to schedule our upcoming events..? This time we will talk about upcoming I/O Extended and After I/O By The Sea.

**It’s a BYC (Bring your coffee) meeting !!**

events.name: Write your first Flutter App | Part 01
events.description:
• What's Flutter?
Flutter is Google’s mobile app SDK for crafting high-quality native interfaces on iOS and Android in record time. Flutter works with existing code, is used by developers and organizations around the world, and is free and open source.

• Purpose & Prerequisites
The purpose is to learn how to build modern new cross-platform (iOS & Android) mobile apps with Flutter.
**Android Studio & Flutter SDK (latest versions)
You need basic web development & software engineer skills to take part.

• What to bring
Charged Laptop/Tablet + your AC charger

**Please visit the link below to install Android Studio & Flutter SDK --> https://flutter.io/get-started/install/

events.name: Google After I/O 2018

venue.name: Cultural and Conference Center of Heraklion

events.description:
#AfterIO18Crete brings together developers from around the globe for talks, hands-on learning with Google developers experts, top-notch developers, local developers and a first look at the latest developer products.

REGISTRATIONS OR TICKETS REQUIRED, please go to our official site for grabbing your seat and for getting the latest updates on the agenda and final schedule: http://bit.ly/afteriotickets

events.name: Zero to App: Building a Serverless App with Firebase and Google Cloud
events.description:
Firebase and Google Cloud Platform allow developers to build extraordinary mobile and web apps quickly. In this talk, Mike McDonald will build an app live on stage and demonstrate how to create a great user experience using Firebase. They then call into Cloud APIs, without having to spin up servers or manage infrastructure. You’ll experience firsthand how easy it is to build with Firebase, and how easy it is to scale with Google Cloud Platform.
SCHEDULE
17:30 - 19:30 | Firebase Office Hours upon appointment only
20:00 - 20:45 | Zero to App (Mike on Stage)
21:00 - 22:00 | Mingling and Networking

events.name: DevFest Greece 2018: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
events.description:
All related info about this year's DevFest Greece can be found on our official site: http://bit.ly/devfestgr18
Looking forward in seeing all of you!

events.name: Think "outside of the box" with Google Design Sprint
events.description:
Join us and get to know how to run your Design Sprint.
The event is split into two sessions:
Part A | Introduction to Design Sprint : we will get to know the methodology and its steps
Part B | Hands on a real challenge: we will go through a Vision Design Sprint throughout all its steps and aspects on a real challenge

Entrance is free, but registration is mandatory, please RSVP here: http://bit.ly/tei_designsprint

events.name: TF Dev Summit 2019 | Viewing party
events.description:
Join us to watch together all the latest updates on TF directly from the TensorFlow | DevSummit and let's grab a beer with a pizza together.
We will watch the live stream of the keynote and perhaps a few more sessions.
This meetup is to warm up the engine and get ready for the upcoming events in Heraklion.

events.name: Deep Neural Networks 101
events.description:
Join Ioannis Anifantakis on stage for an intro on Deep Neural Networks and an after open Q&A session!

The audience will be introduced to the theory and some of the math behind neural networks. We will define simple neural networks, learn about common definitions, and the different types of neural networks.
No code involved!

AGENDA

18:00 Check in - Registration
18:45 Giorgos Glykokokalos: GDG Heraklion intro & next events
19:00 Ioannis Anifantakis: Intro to Deep Neural Networks & Open Q&A

events.name: KOTLIN/Everywhere
events.description:
This is a community-led event, where you can learn the essentials and best practices of Kotlin in Android, Google Cloud, and multi-platforms

Kotlin is a modern and statically typed programming language targeting the JVM, Android, JavaScript & Native that will boost your productivity and increase your developer happiness.
For the latest updates please check here: https://gdggreece.gr/kotlin-everywhere/

Kotlin/Everywhere is part of the Singularity Festival, a city-wide festival of events, that takes place in Heraklion, Crete on the 23-29 of September. During the week we will see a variety of top tech events focused on different technologies.

REGISTRATION IS MANDATORY
Single & Combo tickets are available here:
https://singularityfestival.io/attend/

events.name: FlutterExp
events.description:
FlutterExp* is the first European community driven event dedicated to Flutter™ Explore hand first what’s new in the Flutter™ world, enjoy Talks and Meet with experts coming from every corner of the world, it doesn’t matter if you are a Developer or a Designer everyone is invited to share their experience, bringing high quality content and experiences to the communities.

All related info about this year's FlutterExp can be found on the official site: https://flutterexp.com/

FlutterExp is part of the Singularity Festival, a city-wide festival of events, that takes place in Heraklion, Crete on the 23-29 of September. During the week we will see a variety of top tech events focused on different technologies.

REGISTRATION IS MANDATORY
Single & Combo tickets are available here:
https://singularityfestival.io/attend/

events.name: Diversity Summit 2019
events.description:
Diversity Summit 2019 is dedicated to improving fairness and equity by recognizing the inherent value of every person and group.
At the Diversity Summit, human resource professionals, managers, developers, academia, Public Administration, diversity specialists and employees will learn about various initiative that promote equality and inclusion and will have a unique opportunity to networking.
Join us to foster an environment of respect and understanding and show how we can build a stronger, more inclusive and competitive organization that reflects the diversity of our workforce and customer base.

All related info about this year's Diversity Summit 2019 can be found on our official site: http://diversitysummit.yet.org.gr/

Diversity Summit 2019 is part of the Singularity Festival, a city-wide festival of events, that takes place in Heraklion, Crete on the 23-29 of September. During the week we will see a variety of top tech events focused on different technologies.

REGISTRATION IS MANDATORY
Single & Combo tickets are available here:
https://singularityfestival.io/attend/

events.name: DevFest Greece 2019
events.description:
DevFest hits its 5th time in Heraklion and 7th time in Greece! Organized by the GDGs in Greece it covers multiple products such as Android, Firebase, Google Cloud Platform, Google Assistant, Deep Learning with TensorFlow, and mobile web.

Events may include speaker sessions, hackathons, codelabs, study jams, and trainings. It is an open to the public event thatgives to the audience a wider covergae of Google technologies. This year we will host as well talks and codelabs on tools for growing your business and startup
All related info about this year's DevFest Greece can be found on our official site: https://gdggreece.gr/

Devfest Greece is part of the Singularity Festival, a city-wide festival of events, that takes place in Heraklion, Crete on the 23-29 of September. During the week we will see a variety of top tech events focused on different technologies.

REGISTRATION IS MANDATORY
Single & Combo tickets are available here:
https://singularityfestival.io/attend/

events.name: Firebase Team @DevFest Greece | Special Track
events.description:
Firebase is Google's mobile platform that helps you quickly develop high-quality apps and grow your business.
During our Devfest this year we will have a special track on Firebase hosted by the Google Firebase Team:
Kiana McNellis
Alex Memering
Etienne Kenny
Please stay tuned for the exact time slots.
In order for you to attend you have to hold a DevFest ticket or a Singularity Pass.
All the tickets can be found here: https://singularityfestival.io/attend/

events.name: GDG Heraklion Meetup
events.description: Let's have some coffee and discuss about what's going on with tech, review our last year and plan our next events! ;) For more info check our slack channel! :)
